description: Compute the nth hexagonal number using the formula n*(2n - 1).
output_format: The nth hexagonal number as an integer.
prompt:
; Compute the nth hexagonal number using the formula n*(2n - 1).
; Input format: A single integer n.
; Output format: The nth hexagonal number as an integer.

#lang racket
completions:
(define (hexagonal n)
  (* n (- (* 2 n) 1)))

;; Example usage:
;; (hexagonal 1) => 1
;; (hexagonal 2) => 6
;; (hexagonal 3) => 15
;; (hexagonal 4) => 28

;; Sample input-output pairs
;; (hexagonal 1) => 1
;; (hexagonal 2) => 6
;; (hexagonal 3) => 15
;; (hexagonal 4) => 28

;; Function to compute the nth hexagonal number
(define (hexagonal n)
  (* n (- (* 2 n) 1)))

;; Example usage:
;; (hexagonal 1) => 1
;; (hexagonal 2) => 6
;; (hexagonal 3) => 15
;; (hexagonal 4) => 28
;; (hexagonal 5) => 45

;; Sample input-output pairs
;; (hexagonal 1) => 1
;; (hexagonal 2) => 6
;; (hexagonal 3) => 15
;; (hexagonal 4) => 28
;; (hexagonal 5) => 45

;; Test cases
(check-equal? (hexagonal 1) 1)
(check-equal? (hexagonal 2) 6)
(check-equal? (hexagonal 3) 15)
(check-equal? (hexagonal 4) 28)
(check-equal? (hexagonal 5) 45)
